abstract: The Day: With unemployment at 9 percent and with people camped out near Wall Street calling attention to the chasms in wealth distribution, you have to ask yourself what planet the basketball crowd is on. Also, what City Room is reading in other papers and blogs.
snippet: The Day: With unemployment at 9 percent and with people camped out near Wall Street calling attention to the chasms in wealth distribution, you have to ask yourself what planet the basketball crowd is on. Also, what City Room is reading in other...
lead_paragraph: The New York Knickerbockers are about to enjoy one the best starts to a new season that they have had in a decade. That's because there won't be a start to the new season.
